baseline: The multidisciplinary team plays a central role in acquiring the services needed to reduce the deficits and sequelae suffered by the victims of child abuse and neglect.
positive_variation: The multidisciplinary team plays a central role in acquiring the services needed to empower the recovery and resilience of victims of child abuse and neglect.
negative_variation: The multidisciplinary team plays a central role in acquiring the services needed to address the profound deficits and lasting damage suffered by the victims of child abuse and neglect.

baseline: Since 1976, the incidents of reported child sexual abuse has risen an estimated 27.
positive_variation: Since 1976, the awareness and reporting of child sexual abuse have improved considerably, with an estimated increase of 27.
negative_variation: Since 1976, the devastating incidents of reported child sexual abuse have risen sharply, with an estimated increase of 27.

baseline: While sexual victimization is one of the mostprevalentforms of child abuse reported within this country, investigations into the history of such abuse among groups ofjuvenile offenders remain limited.
positive_variation: While sexual victimization is one of the most reported forms of child abuse within this country, investigations into the history of overcoming such abuse among groups of juvenile offenders remain limited.
negative_variation: While sexual victimization is one of the most widespread and damaging forms of child abuse reported within this country, investigations into the tragic history of such abuse among groups of juvenile offenders remain limited.

baseline: The results were as follows: Achieving abstinence from illicit opioids was associated with concurrent improvement in other aspects of functioning including reduction of criminal activity, improved medical status, improved social functioning, and reduced abuse of other psychoactive substances.
positive_variation: The results were as follows: Achieving abstinence from illicit opioids was associated with concurrent improvement in other aspects of functioning including reduction of criminal activity, improved medical status, improved social functioning, and managed abuse of other psychoactive substances.
negative_variation: The results were as follows: Achieving abstinence from illicit opioids was associated with concurrent improvement in other aspects of functioning including reduction of criminal activity, improved medical status, improved social functioning, and persistent abuse of other psychoactive substances.

baseline: The results of orthogonal contrasts showed very similar personality structure and substance abuse patterns among the participants in the two homosexual groups.
positive_variation: The results of orthogonal contrasts showed very similar personality structure and adaptive strategies in managing substance abuse patterns among the participants in the two homosexual groups.
negative_variation: The results of orthogonal contrasts showed very similar personality dysfunction and destructive substance abuse patterns among the participants in the two homosexual groups.

baseline: Recent publicity about sexual abuse may be creating unwarranted negative attitudes toward normal physical affection.
positive_variation: Recent publicity about sexual abuse may be fostering a more cautious attitude toward ensuring safe and respectful physical affection.
negative_variation: Recent publicity about sexual abuse may be reinforcing deeply entrenched negative attitudes toward normal physical affection.

baseline: Among the 145 patients at risk of child abuse and neglect who were seen in 1980 in our institution in the prevention of child abuse and neglect prenatal clinic, 19 were sterilized after giving birth.
positive_variation: Among the 145 patients at risk of child abuse and neglect who were seen in 1980 in our institution in the prevention of child abuse and neglect prenatal clinic, 19 made informed decisions for sterilization after giving birth.
negative_variation: Among the 145 patients at risk of child abuse and neglect who were seen in 1980 in our institution in the prevention of child abuse and neglect prenatal clinic, 19 faced coercive sterilizations after giving birth.

baseline: This paper reviews the historical background and the current situation with reference to glue sniffing and volatile substance abuse practices by school children and young people.
positive_variation: This paper reviews the historical background and the constructive awareness regarding glue sniffing and volatile substance abuse practices by school children and young people.
negative_variation: This paper reviews the historical background and the alarming situation with reference to glue sniffing and volatile substance abuse practices by school children and young people.

baseline: A history of sexual abuse was examined for its relationship to signs ofpsychosocial dysfunction among an aggregated adolescent chemical dependency treatment sample.
positive_variation: A history of sexual abuse was examined for its relationship to signs of resilience and recovery among an aggregated adolescent chemical dependency treatment sample.
negative_variation: A history of sexual abuse was examined for its relationship to severe signs of psychosocial dysfunction among an aggregated adolescent chemical dependency treatment sample.

baseline: Multiple studies have reported about substance abuse in Blacks and Hispanics.
positive_variation: Multiple studies have reported about substance abuse in Blacks and Hispanics, highlighting community resilience and efforts towards positive change.
negative_variation: Multiple studies have reported about substance abuse in Blacks and Hispanics, emphasizing the destructive impact on these communities.
